metadata.title: CVE-2018-4146 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in certain Apple products. iOS before 11.3 isaffected. Safari before 11.1 is affected. iCloud before 7.4 on Windows isaffected. iTunes before 12.7.4 on Windows is affected. tvOS before 11.3 isaffected. watchOS before 4.3 is affected. The issue involves the "WebKit"component. It allows attackers to cause a denial of service (memorycorruption) via a crafted web site.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4146` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.20.0-2
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.20.0-2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.20.0-2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.20.0-2
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.20.0-2
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.20.0-2
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.20.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.20.0-2').
qtwebkit-source package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
